visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Sales 2022' with data [10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 65] and 'Sales 2023' with data [15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70]. The chart should use custom colors for the series and include additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom styling for the title, axes, and labels. The x-axis categories represent the months from January to December, while the y-axis represents the sales data. The data series include 'Sales 2022' and 'Sales 2023', each with their respective data points. Custom colors are applied to each series for better differentiation. Additional configurations include setting the chart's background color, margins, and enabling the legend with specific styling.
